title: Akali help
body:
Hi Summoners I have been playing akali for a long time now and I think I've played akali for mounths now and I tried to play different champions and I sucked so much. Im looking for people who mained akali for suggestions on which champion I would be decent at thanks.

Bc5081 -  https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCf8e9b3V_ZR-cvz5g9q7OFg

replies.body: I've never mained Akali, and when I tried her I was horrible. However, maybe someone like Lee Sin could be a good person to try, because he has a similar playstyle in the sense that you can jump in and out of battles as him. Maybe other assassins would be a good choice too, like Zed or Kat. Fiora could even be a good choice.
also i must say, you shouldn't really make a montage of you killing bots.. doesn't take that much skill to kill bots.
yes it does, i saw a diamond 1 getting owned by bots they r seriously op freelo
Yea sorry that was when I first started

i would advise you to really play around, get good at other people that you wouldn't normally play, because when you get higher and you have only played one person, you are back a step from other people your lvl, try out adc, even support, cause when it comes to ranked games you will have your fair share of not getting the lane you want. trust me play around now and you won't regret it. also maybe try out zed, he's fun to play and is really good to. also try out lux or even talon. talon would probably be a likely person you might chose cause he does crazy damage, has a invisible (ult) and has a teleport. Good Luck :D
kat, riven are the ones your looking for
Just go ham with all the no mana champs D:

A way to find new champions to main, is to find out who developed said champion (a.k.a. Akali in this instance) and then see if they have worked on any other champions. For this case, Akali was designed by Coronach, so any of the champions listed here might be able to cater to your needs: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Coronach
